field.name: parentWorkEffortId
field.description: For task/etc breakdown

field.name: rootWorkEffortId
field.description: The root of the tree this is part of (if applicable), like a project

field.name: ownerPartyId
field.description: The party that "owns" the work effort, for production runs producing inventory this will be used as the Asset.ownerPartyId

field.name: facilityId
field.description: Where the WorkEffort takes place

field.name: shipmentMethodEnumId
field.description: Mostly for Shipment Load/Ship (WepShipmentShip) purpose, using WorkEffort as a more task and planning oriented approach to a picklist.

field.name: allDayEnd
field.description: Can be null for single day events

field.name: estimatedWorkTime
field.description: Total estimated work time across all parties

field.name: estimatedSetupTime
field.description: Total estimated setup time across all parties

field.name: remainingWorkTime
field.description: Total remaining work time across all parties

field.name: actualWorkTime
field.description: Total actual work time across all parties

field.name: actualSetupTime
field.description: Total actual setup time across all parties

field.name: totalTimeAllowed
field.description: Total work time allowed (budgeted) across all parties

field.name: estimatedWorkDuration
field.description: Estimated work duration in calendar time (see estimatedWorkTime for total worked time across parties)

field.name: actualWorkDuration
field.description: Actual work duration in calendar time (see actualWorkTime for total worked time across parties)

field.name: actualBreakDuration
field.description: Actual break duration in calendar time

field.name: timeUomId
field.description: Time unit for all time and duration fields; defaults to hours (TF_hr)

entity.description: For equipment, inventory, etc needed in the work effort.
Categories for WorkEffort, especially events like iCal/VCALENDAR categories

field.name: partyId
field.description: The party performing work (worker, may be the vendor or work for the vendor)

field.name: clientPartyId
field.description: Should always be set, may get through timesheetId or workEffortId

field.name: hasModifiedRates
field.description: Set to Y when *Rate fields are manually set and not from RateAmount lookups

field.name: rateAmountId
field.description: Client/customer hourly RateAmount reference

field.name: vendorRateAmountId
field.description: Vendor/worker hourly RateAmount reference

field.name: breakHours
field.description: Non-paid break hours e.g. Lunch

field.name: pieceRateAmountId
field.description: Client/customer piece RateAmount reference

field.name: vendorPieceRateAmountId
field.description: Vendor/worker piece RateAmount reference

field.name: facilityId
field.description: Where the work was done; if null and workEffortId is set get from WorkEffort.facilityId
